Chapter 3 How to set up your tablet 3.0.0.1 Learning Objectives Understand how to collect ForestPlots data using Excel on a tablet Set up your computer In order to collect data on your tablet via excel, you need two things: To stay organised and Excel Once you have those, you are ready to prepare your field sheets. Preparing field sheets Preparing field sheets to collect data on a tablet is very similar to preparing regular field sheets. In fact, the first steps are the same: download a field sheet from ForestPlots and format it so that you can see only the columns that you want to be able to work with. The next step is slightly different. Rather than set your print area, now you are going to lock columns that you do not want to accidentally modify in the field.
